String.string: Talk to Seir in Valkyon Federation Headquarters.
Head to the Temple of Dagon.
Head to the Temple of Dagon from Frontera.
You found the tracks of a humanoid. Could it be Karakhir?
Search for Karakhir’s tracks along your way to the Temple of Dagon.
Finish your search and look for more tracks.
Continue your search for Karakhir’s tracks.
Finish your search and look for more tracks.
Go little further to find more tracks.
Continue your search for Karakhir’s trace.
Continue your search for Karakhir’s tracks.
The gold pouch might belong to Karakhir.
You found a secret entrance that leads to a place behind the cliff.
Karakhir must have been here. Look for more tracks.
You found a hidden village behind the cliff.
Karakhir’s tracks end here. Use the {@LinkCreature:39#403#teleportal} to find what is behind the cliff.
Calm him and tell him to wait outside the village.
Choose one passage to continue your search for Karakhir.
Continue your search for Karakhir’s tracks.
Kill all orcan guards to make your way.
Continue your search for Karakhir’s tracks.
You spot a suspicious castanic woman.
You found the kidnapper. Approach her to rescue Karakhir.
Continue your search for Karakhir’s tracks.
Continue your search for Karakhir’s tracks.
Kill orcan guards at the staircase.
Continue your search for Karakhir’s tracks.
Someone might be imprisoned in the house.
You hear sounds of a fight. Find out what's happening.
You found imprisoned Karakhir. Approach him.
Calm Karakhir and set him free.
Tell Karakhir to escape the village and meet his apprentice.
You found a rigid, sharp object on the floor. Examine it.
Closely examine the Piece of Amani Horn.
Destroy the door and kill the Armory guards to chase Hennika.
Enter the armory to go after Hennika.
You found traces of a beast by a little passageway. Follow them.
You are back to the facade of the cliff. There is no sign of Hennika.
Escape the village and continue chasing Hennika.
Explain to Aktam what happened in the Red Refuge.
